title: How to Bake a Spicy Devil's Food Cake

steps.headline: Melt the squares of chocolate over a double boiler or in the microwave oven.
Grease and flour a flat pan.
steps.description: Use cocoa instead of flour to dust the pan to prevent that floury look.

steps.headline: Add the eggs one-at-a-time to the butter mixture and cream until fluffy.
Sift the baking powder, cinnamon, cloves, ginger, and nutmeg together.
steps.description: You can use a sieve (which is easier to clean) rather than an old-fashioned flour sifter for this task.

steps.headline: Add the dry ingredients alternately with the milk.
Pour the cake batter into the prepared cake pan.
Spread batter evenly with a spatula.
Bake until cake tests done.
steps.description: A wooden toothpick inserted in the center will come out clean.

text: Melt the squares of chocolate over a double boiler or in the microwave oven.  Preheat oven to 350ºF or 180ºC.  Grease and flour a flat pan. Use cocoa instead of flour to dust the pan to prevent that floury look. Cream the butter and sugar.  Add the eggs one-at-a-time to the butter mixture and cream until fluffy.  Sift the baking powder, cinnamon, cloves, ginger, and nutmeg together. You can use a sieve (which is easier to clean) rather than an old-fashioned flour sifter for this task. Add the dry ingredients alternately with the milk.  Pour the cake batter into the prepared cake pan.  Spread batter evenly with a spatula.  Bake until cake tests done. A wooden toothpick inserted in the center will come out clean. Ice with favorite chocolate frosting.  Finished.
